entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10 except minus 15 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10 except minus 15 inland. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
